content: Generated `/mnt/data/outputs/coverage_matrix.csv` containing a populated coverage matrix with clear headers and at least one example row per Mathematics domain (including subtopics, tracked artifact types, cross-links, prerequisites, and notes) to guide further expansion.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('outputs/coverage_matrix.csv')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = []
chunks.append("""Domain,Subtopic,Artifact_Types_Tracked,Example_Artifacts,Coverage_Status,Cross_Link_Targets,Prerequisites,Notes
Algebra,Linear equations & inequalities,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: solving 1-variable linear equations; Worked example set; Practice set (20); Quiz (10 Q) + key",seeded,"Number Theory: integers; Geometry: coordinate plane",Arithmetic operations; order of operations,Includes both symbolic manipulation and word problems.
Algebra,Quadratic functions & equations,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: factoring/completing square; Worked examples; Practice set; Quiz + key",seeded,"Calculus: limits (polynomials); Geometry: parabolas",Linear equations; factoring basics,Track multiple solution methods (factoring/quadratic formula/completing square).
Geometry,Triangle congruence & similarity,"lesson,diagram_set,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: SSS/SAS/ASA/AAS; Similarity ratios; Diagram set; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Trigonometry: ratios; Algebra: proportions",Angle facts; basic proofs,Include reasoning-focused proof prompts and diagram interpretation.
Geometry,Circle theorems,"lesson,diagram_set,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: central/inscribed angles; chords/tangents; Diagram set; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Trigonometry: arcs; Algebra: coordinate geometry",Similarity; angle properties,Use consistent notation (arc measures, angle subtensions).
Trigonometry,Right-triangle trigonometry,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: sin/cos/tan; inverse trig; Worked examples; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Geometry: similarity; Algebra: solving equations",Similarity; Pythagorean theorem,Include unit consistency and angle-mode reminders.
Trigonometry,Unit circle & radian measure,"lesson,visual_aid,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: radians; special angles; Visual aid (unit circle); Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Calculus: derivatives of trig; Geometry: circle basics",Right-triangle trig; angles,Track both exact values and approximations; include reference-angle strategy.
Calculus,Limits & continuity,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: limit laws; one-sided limits; continuity; Worked examples; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Analysis: epsilon ideas; Algebra: function manipulation",Functions; factoring; rational expressions,Include graphical, numerical, and algebraic limit estimation artifacts.
Calculus,Differentiation (rules & applications),"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: power/product/quotient/chain; optimization; Related rates; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Linear Algebra: tangent approximations; Probability: density basics",Limits; trig basics,Tag application contexts (physics/economics) for reuse.
Calculus,Integration (techniques & applications),"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: antiderivatives; substitution; area/accumulation; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Probability & Statistics: continuous distributions; Differential Equations: separable",Differentiation; algebraic manipulation,Include both definite/indefinite integrals and interpretation of units.
Probability & Statistics,Descriptive statistics & data visualization,"lesson,worksheet,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: mean/median/variance; histograms/boxplots; Worksheet; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Algebra: formulas; Discrete Math: counting tables",Arithmetic; basic algebra,Track real datasets and plotting conventions as reusable assets.
Probability & Statistics,Probability rules & conditional probability,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: addition/multiplication; Bayes; independence; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Discrete Math: combinatorics; Calculus: integrals (continuous prob)",Set notation; fractions,Include tree diagrams and contingency-table artifacts for cross-linking.
Number Theory,Divisibility, primes, and gcd/lcm,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: divisibility tests; Euclid algorithm; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Algebra: factoring; Discrete Math: modular arithmetic",Integer arithmetic,Track common misconceptions (e.g., gcd vs lcm) as error-check items.
Number Theory,Congruences & modular arithmetic,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: mod operations; modular inverses; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Discrete Math: cryptography; Algebra: remainders",Divisibility; gcd,Include artifacts for solving linear congruences and interpreting residues.
Discrete Mathematics,Counting (permutations, combinations, inclusion–exclusion),"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: counting principles; nCr/nPr; inclusion–exclusion; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Probability & Statistics: probability; Algebra: binomial theorem",Basic algebra,Tag problem types (arrangements, distributions, set unions) for coverage checks.
Discrete Mathematics,Graph theory basics,"lesson,visual_aid,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: graphs/trees; degrees; paths; Visual aid; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Linear Algebra: adjacency matrices; Algorithms: BFS/DFS",Set notation; counting basics,Include canonical example graphs for consistent referencing.
Linear Algebra,Vectors, dot product, and projections,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: vectors; dot product; projections; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Calculus: gradients; Geometry: coordinates",Algebra; geometry basics,Include geometric interpretation diagrams and computational exercises.
Linear Algebra,Matrices, systems, and determinants,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: Gaussian elimination; inverses; determinants; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Algebra: linear systems; Discrete Math: adjacency matrices",Vectors; solving linear equations,Track both row-reduction steps and conceptual meaning (invertibility, rank).
Real Analysis,Sequences/series & convergence,"lesson,worked_example,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: sequence limits; series tests; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Calculus: power series; Probability: expectations (series)",Calculus limits; algebra,Include comparison/ratio/root tests and counterexample artifacts.
Real Analysis,Continuity & differentiability (rigor),"lesson,worked_example,proof_prompt,practice_set,quiz,solution_key","Lesson: epsilon-delta; differentiability; Proof prompts; Practice; Quiz + key",seeded,"Calculus: derivatives; Topology: open sets (optional)",Sequences; basic logic,Track proof templates (definition unpacking, contraposition) as reusable artifacts.
""")

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:outputs/coverage_matrix.csv')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Generated `/mnt/data/outputs/coverage_matrix.csv` containing a populated coverage matrix with clear headers and at least one example row per Mathematics domain (including subtopics, tracked artifact types, cross-links, prerequisites, and notes) to guide further expansion.
